text: The Whitman River is an river in Massachusetts that flows through Ashburnham, Westminster and Fitchburg. It arises from Lake Wampanoag in Ashburnham, travels through a couple of ponds in Westminster, and ultimately joins Phillips Brook in Fitchburg to form the North Nashua River. == See also == * Rivers of Massachusetts * Nashua River * North Nashua River == References == http://www.nashuariverwatershed.org/ Category:Rivers of Massachusetts Category:Rivers of Worcester County, Massachusetts
title: Whitman River
